heading: HB00132
0: AN ACT PROVIDING FOOD SUBSIDY EVERY QUARTER TO SENIOR CITIZENS IN THE FORM OF ONE (1) SACK OF RICE AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7432, AS AMENDED BY REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9994, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS ꞌTHE EXPANDED SENIOR CITIZENS ACT OF 2010ꞌ
status: Pending with the Committee on SENIOR CITIZENS since 2019-07-23
